summary: This is a brief internal notification from a Captain at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, advising lieutenants that eight FBI officials will be visiting the institution's Special Housing Unit (SHU) on August 17, 2019, for investigative matters and requesting a lieutenant be available to escort them.

persons.name: Captain Metropolitan Correctional Center
persons.context: The Captain at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York is issuing an advisory to lieutenants regarding an upcoming FBI visit to the SHU.

events.title: FBI Visit to MCC New York SHU
events.description: Eight FBI officials visited the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York to perform investigative matters.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center
keyFacts: Eight FBI officials conducted an investigative visit to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 17, 2019.
The visit required a lieutenant from the institution to be available to escort the FBI officials while they were in the SHU.
The document is an internal advisory from a Captain at the MCC, indicating coordination for law enforcement access to a secure area of the facility.
